title: F. W. de Klerk, South Africa’s last apartheid president, dies at 85
content:
1. F. W. de Klerk, South Africa’s last apartheid president, dies at 85  NBC News
  2. FW de Klerk, South Africa's last apartheid leader who freed Nelson Mandela, dies at 85  CNN
  3. F.W. de Klerk, Last President of Apartheid South Africa, Dies at 85  The New York Times
  4. South Africa's former president FW de Klerk dies aged 85 - BBC News  BBC News
  5. F.W. de Klerk, South African Nobel Prize winner for opening government, dies at 85  The Washington Post
